titles: A discourse made by the Ld Bishop of Rochester to the clergy of his diocese at his visitation in the year 1695 : published at their request.
author: Church of England. Diocese of Rochester. Bishop (1684-1713 : Sprat)
Sprat, Thomas, 1635-1713.
notes: Half-title page reads: The Ld Bishop of Rochester's discourse to his clergy, &c.
Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
keywords: Church of England --  Pastoral letters and charges.
